item.title: Transforms
item.description: Before reading this, make sure you have an understanding of vectors and how they’re used in game development. If you don’t, I recommend you read this introduction I wrote for the Godot documentation: Vector Math. 2D Transforms In 2D space, we use the familiar X-Y coordinate plane. Remember that in Godot, as in most computer graphics applications, the Y axis points downward: To begin, let’s consider this spaceship floating in space:
